RESOURCE.STRING: Fuel Pump Test
The Fuel Pump Test helps troubleshoot the fuel system by running a series of system health and consistency checks.
Instructions
Inputs
Monitors
User Comments
Status
Name
Value
Units
Engine Shutdown
Print
1.) Please troubleshoot any active fault codes prior to starting the test.
2.) Select whether the test will Automatically or Manually Shutdown the engine at the designated time.
3.) Ensure engine is at an Idle State.
4.) Select Start to run the test.
5.) The results will be displayed when the test is completed.
Automatic
Manual
This test is not supported by the current calibration.
The Fuel Pump Test could not be started because Engine Speed was not detected. Please restart the test with the engine running.
The Fuel Pump Test has not started because the engine needs to be brought to an idle state to run.
The Fuel Pump Test has been stopped due to a communication error with the child module. Please troubleshoot the datalink lines before restarting the test.
The Fuel Pump Test has stopped because a task has failed to complete in the time required.
The Fuel Pump Test has been stopped due to an unexpected high load detected on the engine.
The Fuel Pump Test needs the Engine to be shutdown. Please select the Engine Shutdown Control.
The Fuel Pump Test needs the Engine to be shutdown. Please wait while the engine cools down before shutting down engine.
The Fuel Pump Test is running. Please wait.
The Fuel Pump Test has not been requested to be started. Please restart the test.
Test Stopped.
Test aborted due to an invalid condition. Please restart test.
Show
